DOC.brief_title: Assessing Effectiveness Two Treatment Strategies Tension-type Headache
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim pilot data proposal compare usual care ( medication ) versus multi-disciplinary treatment TMD patient episodic chronic tension-type headache ( TTH ) pericranial tenderness involve temporalis muscle reduce intensity TTH pain 1 6 month . The hypothesis team approach reduce intensity headache usual care group patient .
DOC.criteria: Fifty consecutive subject ( Age 18 65 ) include fulfill diagnostic criterion episodic chronic TTH pericranial muscle tenderness3 TMD include myofascial pain involve temporalis muscle Exclusion criterion , assess review medical history , include : systemic rheumatic disease widespread pain pregnancy concurrent use tricyclic antidepressant , steroid , antiinflammatories , muscle relaxant , narcotic major psychiatric disease medical contraindication
